metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12086 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in OPC UA applications allows remote attackers to trigger a stack overflow with carefully structured requests.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
libwireshark13 - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
libwiretap10 - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
libwsutil11 - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
tshark - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
wireshark - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
wireshark-common - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
wireshark-qt - 2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.6-1~ubuntu14.04.0').
